text: Bourgneuf-en-Retz is a former commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Loire-Atlantique department in western France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Villeneuve-en-Retz.Arrêté préfectoral 29 September 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Loire-Atlantique
title: Bourgneuf-en-Retz
